page.title: 16Taylors Newsagents.
page.content: Taylors is a newsagents situated in a very convenient position in the village. It is not a large shop but very homely, it is warm in the winter and cool in the summer. Mr Taylor has to deliver papers not only locally but to some of the surrounding villages. He orders some 5250 papers and 1000 comics and magazines per week. The most popular paper is the Daily Telegraph. The busiest times of the day, in the morning is about 8am when the children go to catch the school coach and adults are going to work. Then in the evening at about 4pm when the children return from school. Not only do they sell papers but sweets, cigarettes, cards, ice-creams and even video films. The most popular sweet sold in the shop "Rowntrees Fruit Gums" (a chewy fruit sweet).
